thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Have your say on comments!
thread.title_full: Have your say on comments! | News24

author: news24.com
title: Have your say on comments!
text:
ON the back of our decision to keep comments on our site disabled by default, there have been a variety of differing views.
We'd like to hear them all... If you feel strongly about the move weâ€™ve made (and it doesn't matter if you agree or disagree), we invite you to submit your feelings on the subject via MyNews24 .
We will consider submissions of longer than 200 words, and publish those which comply with our policy.
The writers of these submission will be eligible for two prizes which are up for grabs.
This all starts now!
Submissions for this competition will be closed at noon on Friday. Only submissions uploaded via MyNews24 will be accepted.
But that doesn't stop you from continuing to submit and be published on MyNews24 !
